name: Primordial (itch) (Promethaes)
description:
Contributors:
Anthony Smiderle (Myself)

Daniel Hong (Synral)
Daniel Presas (SentientCoffee)
Jeremy Kan (De Waffle Masta)

Primordial is a rogue-like, fast-paced, first-person, looter shooter inspired by Doom, Binding of Issac, and Warhammer 40k. 

You play as a space looter looking for Sednium across an abandoned ship with your crew to restock your ship supplies. Meanwhile, you must fend off enemies in the ship, all to continue your journey through the wreck.
